attributes.title: Trump app more like Dump app (made me poop a lot)
attributes.review: I downloaded this app thinking I would be able to get in touch with my favourite guy. but I was wrong. oddly enough, it made my room smell really really bad. Iâ€™m talking old cream cheese sitting outside in Florida heat for 50 days. I tried everything. Febreze didnâ€™t work only made it worse. I have no pets, no kids, I am just a hard working single American. I even moved houses and THE SMELL WOULDNT LEAVE. Finally, I deleted the app and ***BOOM*** smell was gone. I redownloaded it a little while ago and the smell came back shortly after. But this time, it wasnâ€™t just cream cheese, it was the awful smell of saliva covered fingers with the residue of the Cheeto dust that once was there. it was rotten. I threw up so hard that I was pooping at the same time. My throat swelled and my hole collapsed. My face veins popped and I went to the emergency room. I needed to delete that app. So I did. This app has not only brainwashed me, but washed my insides out. Unless youâ€™re looking for a super laxative, this app is useless. Delete it from the App Store before someone else gets hurt! very angry. very sad. bad.
